name: Metroid: Alien Corruption
description:
Overview:

Explore the dark corridors of the USG Ishimura as the famous bounty hunter, Samus Aran. Hunt down the Alien outbreak and put a stop to the Space Pirates' plan in this all new adventure.

 

The year is 2690. After destroying the B.S.L. Station, Samus has been on the run from the Galactic Federation and is now in Cryo sleep on a far off planet, Aegis VII. While asleep, the Space Pirates have taken over a nearby Planet Cracker class ship that was being used to study an unknown Xenomorphic species found residing deep within the planet.

 

Board the USG Ishimura and find out what happened to the missing crew and what the Space Pirates are really up to.

 

Find upgrades and new beam weapons, unlock doors and puzzles and traverse multiple dimension. 

 

This map is large and will easily take 20+ hours to beat the first time. There are multiple endings and ways to beat the game. Beat the game is less than 1 hour with no deaths to unlock a secret stash in the Cargo Hold!

 

This is my first game and has taken me about 2 years to make. I would love some thoughts from the community so I can keep making improvements, so please leave a comment below.

NEW SPOTIFY PLAYLIST!!!

"Metroid: Alien Corruption"

REQUIRED TO PLAY:

 - Install Minecraft Java Edition

 - Start the game at least once

 - Install Minecraft Forge 1.7.10

 - Extract "Metroid Alien Corruption.zip" into your Minecraft Directory

- Play the game using the Forge 1.7.10 version and select the save file called    "Metroid: Alien Corruption"

Extra Special Credits:

Metroid Cubed 3 - FirEmerald

AliensvsPredator - Ri5ux

Original USG Ishimura structure - smith_smithson

Space Architect - Scamper3396

 

Thank you all for the work you have done. It has allowed me to make one of my dreams a reality.
